attributes.action: Allow the public to vote on whether or not they want to be in the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that the British public should be allowed that all important vote denied to them by this government, which has sold off much of our freedom, and many of our values by forcing us to integrate further into the EU.
The PM should seriously think this through, because the 61 million people, who had no say on whether they wanted him to lead them, should at the very least be able to vote on this. And whether the EU holds benefits of membership or not, the public should be allowed to decide whether this is worth the sale of their freedoms, and what it means to be British.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
